org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.random
Class GridCacheRandomEvictionPolicy<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.random.GridCacheRandomEvictionPolicy<K,V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridCacheEvictionPolicy<K,V>, GridCacheRandomEvictionPolicyMBean
public class GridCacheRandomEvictionPolicy<K,V>
extends Object
implements GridCacheEvictionPolicy<K,V>, GridCacheRandomEvictionPolicyMBean

Cache eviction policy which will select random cache entry for eviction if cache size exceeds the GridCacheRandomEvictionPolicy.getMaxSize() parameter. This implementation is extremely light weight, lock-free, and does not create any data structures to maintain any order for eviction.

Random eviction will provide the best performance over any key set in which every key has the same probability of being accessed.
